statements: SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions;
SELECT protein_id, affinity FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, ligand_id FROM ProteinLigandInteractions ORDER BY affinity DESC;
SELECT protein_id, interaction_type, affinity FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE ligand_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE protein_id = 789 AND affinity > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE protein_id = 1 ORDER BY affinity DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, protein_id, ligand_id, interaction_type FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE affinity > 5;
SELECT interaction_id, protein_id, ligand_id, interaction_type, affinity FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Hydrophobic' ORDER BY protein_id ASC;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM ProteinLigandInteractions GROUP BY protein_id HAVING affinity > 3;
SELECT AVG(affinity) AS average_affinity, MAX(affinity) AS max_affinity FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Electrostatic';
SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions;
SELECT protein_id, interaction_type FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE affinity_score > 5.0;
SELECT protein_id, affinity_score FROM ProteinLigandInteractions ORDER BY affinity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'binding'
SELECT protein_id, affinity_score FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE affinity_score > 7.5 ORDER BY affinity_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE affinity_score IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Researchers r INNER JOIN ProteinLigandInteractions pl ON r.researcher_id = pl.protein_id
SELECT researcher_name, research_interests FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University'
SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions;
SELECT protein_id, interaction_type, interaction_score FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE ligand_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, organism FROM Proteins ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT ligand_name, chemical_formula, molecular_weight FROM Ligands WHERE molecular_weight > 200;
SELECT protein_name AS name, gene_name AS gene FROM Proteins WHERE organism = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE interaction_score > 7.5 ORDER BY protein_id DESC

SELECT protein_name, gene_name, organism, ligand_name FROM Proteins JOIN ProteinLigandInteractions ON Proteins.protein_id = ProteinLigandInteractions.protein_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Inhibitor' ORDER BY ligand_id ASC
SELECT protein_id, ligand_id, interaction_type FROM ProteinLigandInteractions WHERE protein_id = 10 AND interaction_type IN ('Activator', 'Inhibitor')
SELECT DISTINCT ligand_name, molecular_weight FROM Ligands WHERE molecular_weight > 200 ORDER BY ligand_id

SELECT protein_name, gene_name, ligand_name FROM Proteins JOIN ProteinLigandInteractions ON Proteins.protein_id = ProteinLigandInteractions.protein_id JOIN Ligands ON Ligands.ligand_id = ProteinLigandInteractions.ligand_id ORDER BY protein_name ASC, ligand_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Proteins;
SELECT name, sequence FROM Proteins ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, affinity FROM Interactions WHERE affinity > 7.0;
SELECT researcher_id, name, affiliation FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT p.name AS protein_name, l.name AS ligand_name, i.affinity FROM Proteins p JOIN Interactions i ON p.protein_id = i.protein_id JOIN Ligands l ON i.ligand_id = l.ligand_id;
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, sequence FROM Proteins WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ligands WHERE ligand_id = '78901234-5678-90ab-cdef-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM Interactions WHERE affinity > 5 ORDER BY affinity DESC;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University A' AND name != 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM researchers
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers
SELECT * FROM ligands
SELECT ligand_name, ligand_structure FROM ligands
SELECT * FROM proteins
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'Biology';
SELECT ligand_name, ligand_structure FROM ligands ORDER BY ligand_name DESC;

SELECT researcher_name, protein_name, ligand_name, interaction_score FROM researchers r JOIN interactions i ON r.researcher_id = i.researcher_id JOIN proteins p ON i.protein_id = p.protein_id JOIN ligands l ON i.ligand_id = l.ligand_id;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date FROM researchers r JOIN experiments e ON r.researcher_id = e.researcher_id WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
